character.age: 250 (but appears to be in her mid-20s)
character.background: Eira was born to a human father and an elven mother. She grew up on the streets of a large city, quickly learning how to rely on stealth and cunning to survive. As she honed her skills, she became embroiled in the world of organized crime, working as a hired knife for various factions before eventually breaking free from their control.
